page.title: 16Community Life
page.content: The Eden valley area around Langwathby is a caring community.Many families have lived here for generations and most people are known to each other.If you are ill or need help there is always someone near.The Fell Runner is a community mini bus which is driven by volunteers.It has a weekly visiting run to Carlisle hospitals.It runs guided tours in the summer.It takes people further afield for guided walks to Cow Green,Teesdale and Dufton.We can hire it for our own use.A car service uses private cars for trans- port to Doctor,Dentist or Hospital if needed.The Memo is a news sheet which is delivered to all houses in the area It gives details of activities and all can contribute.Meals on wheels go out once a week from school.Neighbour Hood Watch is the latest scheme although we have always done this unoffically.
